name: Fizik Tempo Microtex Classic Handlebar Tape
description: If you're looking for a top performance bartape that won't get slippery, the Tempo Microtex classic is the one to get. Thin but comfortable 2mm-thick tape provides precise control and makes you feel like you're one with your bike. The leather-like texture is extremely durable and easy to care for.Microtex material has a leather-like texture with improved durability.2mm-thick tape provides maximum control.Includes 2 bar end plugs, 2 pieces of finishing tape and 2 short tape sections to cover the shifter clamp area.
